text: Centromadia fitchii, common name Fitch's spikeweed or Fitch's tarweed, is a species of North American plants in the tarweed tribe within the sunflower family. It is native to California and southwestern Oregon.Biota of North America Program 2014 county distribution mapCalflora taxon report, University of California, Centromadia fitchii (A.Gray) Greene, Spikeweed Centromadia fitchii is an herb up to 50 cm (20 inches) tall. It produces arrays of numerous yellow flower heads with both ray florets and disc florets.Flora of North America, Spikeweed, Centromadia GreeneGreene, Edward Lee 1894.
